document_title: Brugada syndrome: Causes, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: hoi-chung-brugada.json_7_Caring for patients with Brugada Syndrome
subsection_content:
If you have been diagnosed with Brugada syndrome, you should be evaluated and treated by an experienced Arrhythmia specialist. This approach helps ensure that you receive the best possible care by a team of doctors: (4)
Cardiologist;; Doctor specializing in cardiac arrhythmia;; Genetic doctor;; Your family doctor regularly looks after your health.
Contact us now for advice and to schedule an examination with leading cardiovascular experts at Tam Anh General Hospital System:
Complications of Brugada syndrome require emergency medical attention, including fainting or sudden cardiac arrest. If not treated immediately, sudden loss of heart function, breathing, and consciousness (usually occurring during sleep) occurs, which can be fatal. With quick and appropriate medical care, the patient can be saved.
